snippet.title: Heart Agency: A BL Visual Novel Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2293190/Heart_Agency/

Updates to Heart Agency are currently exclusive to our Patreon, sign up today to get access to behind the scene previews and beta: https://www.patreon.com/CatsonaLilypadStudios

*ABOUT THE GAME*
Adrian Heart is a genius composer, also a secret one.

Not a soul save for his sister and her husband know the identity of the mysterious composer behind one of the worlds most beloved pop princesses.

Unfortunately for him, his anonymity is about to work against him when said sister asks him to assist at their families talent agency.

Heart Agency, the worlds leading talent agency, home to some of the most elite popular talent.

Join Adrian in this BL Visual Novel as he gets to know his new charges, and maybe even falls in love.

*CREDITS*
Studio: https://twitter.com/CatsLilypad
Trailer: https://twitter.com/FoxdriftStudios
Music: https://twitter.com/mdomagalamusic
